text: Haiti Ambassador Airlines was an airline based in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. It was a private airline operating an international service to New York, USA. ==History== The airline was established in April 2002 and started operations in 2003. It is owned by Christopher Doyle (48%), Georgemay Figaro, Airline President (48%), Jean-Philippe Padern (2%) and Kathleen Buteau (2%). ==Services== Haiti Ambassador Airlines operated an international service between Port-au-Prince and New York (John F. Kennedy International Airport) in January 2005. ==Fleet== The Haiti Ambassador Airlines fleet consisted of 1 Boeing 767-300 aircraft leased from LAN in January 2005. Category:Defunct airlines of Haiti Category:Airlines established in 2002 Category:2002 establishments in Haiti Category:Companies based in Port-au-Prince
title: Haïti Ambassador Airlines
